pages.text:
================= post ================
Back to ABnormal!
Everything On Our Menu is 1/2 Off From 3-5pm on Weekdays!
All February long!
Dine-in Only.
Schooners Special Events Always something special going on... IMPORTANT: Some entertainment, events and festivals may be canceled or rescheduled due to ongoing COVID-19 restrictions and concerns. Please contact us for further details. Special events at Schooners take place year-round, and are dedicated fundraisers for important community services and special causes.

Event Calendar

2020 ENTERTAINMENT CANCELLED Schooners is known for its live music and events! Check out our Panama City Beach calendar for the most recent band and event dates.
Sunset Celebration (Every Night!) Every night, Schooners fires off the old cannon at sunset to celebrate another beautiful day on the beach and ring in the night with a whole different kind of fun. Valentine's Day Love is in the air at Schooners for Valentine's Day! Celebrate with your sweetheart at the Last Local Beach Club. Easter Celebration Each year, Schooners hosts the Little Locals Beach Easter Egg Hunt on Saturday of Easter Weekend. The pristine, sandy white beach in front of Schooners is the ideal site for an "old fashion" Easter Egg Hunt with prizes, candy, gift certificates and trophies awarded in each division.

Cajun Festival

Cajun Music, Cajun Food & Cajun Fun! C'mon ova ya'll! Annual Cajun Festival at Schooners. Great Cajun Food and Great Cajun Music Beach Party & Crawfish Boil Saturday and Sunday with daytime band on the beach.
Margaret K. Lewis Beach Party Schooners has invited the exceptional students from the Margaret K. Lewis Center to enjoy a Beach Party in their honor. The kids revel in splashing in the water, rolling in the sand and dancing with one another on the dance floor. Mother's Day Celebrate Mother's Day by bringing her to a place on a beautiful beach with a friendly team of chefs, servers and hosts. Lobster Festival Join us as we honor the noble lobster at our annual Lobster Festival with live entertainment, bonfires, delicious Lobzilla lobster specials, and more! Lobzilla Join us as we honor the noble lobster in a variety of delicious ways! That's right, Lobzilla is back... and it's bigger than ever! Fall Back 50 The air is cool. The humidity has let up. It’s back to us locals for a few months... Locals’ Season. Time to gather at Schooners, and just for you, we’ve got everything 1/2 off 3-5pm weekdays in November.

Halloween Bash

Schooners has become something of a Halloween tradition. Everybody turns up to see the scary decorations that get KRRRAZIER every year. Bats, monsters, ghosts, witches, lights, fog, coffins, tombstones...and that's just on the OUTSIDE... once you get inside... it's just... well... bwahahahahaaaa! Scary!
Welcome to the Holidays This Holiday Season we're focusing on all we have to be thankful for: family, friends and you - our loyal customers. We are grateful for your spirit, your love and your light and wish you a holiday that is merry and bright! Our warmest wishes for a safe holiday season, from our family to yours. Locals' Christmas Party & Toy Drive What better way to ring in the holiday season than gathered around a glowing bonfire right on the beach surrounded by all your friends? Schooners invites you to join us for our Locals' Christmas Party & Toy Drive. New Year's Eve Celebration Rock in the New Year on the beach with live music and a champagne toast at midnight! ================= sidebar ================ SPECIAL MESSAGE AREA

We are CLOSED for a few weeks while we spruce up. Reopening February 3rd.

================= post ================ About Schooners The Last Local Beach Club Locals claim it's the "best place on the planet," and they call Schooners the Last Local Beach Club. They come early and stay all day to play volleyball, watch the kids splash in the surf or just watch the waves roll in. Schooners' menu is not fancy — just perfect casual 'beach food' — fresh, full of flavor and served up with a friendly smile and a spectacular view! It's a local tradition to gather on the beach behind Schooners every night to celebrate Sunset — the crowd counts down and, just as the sun dips below the horizon, they blast an old cannon and the real fun begins! Schooners is on the historic East End of Panama City Beach , right on the beach. The Last Local Beach Club is open year 'round for lunch and dinner. Schooners Live Cams are legendary. ================= sidebar ================ SPECIAL MESSAGE AREA

We are CLOSED for a few weeks while we spruce up. Reopening February 3rd.

================= post ================ About Panama City Beach The World's Most Beautiful Beaches Panama City Beach is located in Bay County, Florida, in the north-western part of the Sunshine State (known as the Florida Panhandle). Panama City Beach is legendary for its 27 miles of pristine, sugar-white sand and gorgeous emerald-green waters. It's also well-known as one of the top vacation destinations in the USA, boasting first-class attractions, award-winning restaurants, unbelievable fishing and boating opportunities, quaint beach bars, unique shopping experiences, big festivals, special events and a host of other indoor and outdoor activities! The weather in Panama City Beach is mild year-round, with the typical warmth and sunshine of a tropical climate during most months. The hospitality and friendly nature of locals adds a bit of Southern charm and warmth to the area, with many visitors relocating to live in Panama City Beach full time. Whether you call Panama City Beach home permanently or just for a few days, you'll appreciate the laid-back, easy going nature of this beautiful beach town and all the fun stuff available to locals and visitors alike. Click here to read more about Panama City Beach ================= sidebar ================ SPECIAL MESSAGE AREA

We are CLOSED for a few weeks while we spruce up. Reopening February 3rd.
